Gregory "Krikko" Obbott bụ ónyé Naijiria-Amerịka na-ese ihe na ónyé na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ nke a maara nke ọma màkà nnukwu ihe osise pensụl ya nke ọbọdọ. Ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ ya na-egosi na nnukwu ebe njem ọha na eze, a pụkwara ịzụta ya n'aka ndị na-ere ahịa na ebe ndị njem nleta dị ka Empire State Building, Statue of Liberty, Fifth Avenue, na Skyscraper Museum
"Krikko" bụ aha ọ na-eji eme ihe màkà ọrụ ya niile.
Krikko emeela ihe karịrị puku iri na ise eserese nke ụlọ ọbọdọ, ọtụtụ n'ime ha sitere na postcard na foto
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a site na ụlọ ọrụ Krikko Productions, nke dị na Winthrop Avenue na New Haven, CT
Krikko si n'ọbọdọ Okon na ikot abasi mpaghara gọọmentị nke akwa ibom steeti, ndịda Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ naanị nwa nne na nna ya mụrụ
Nné ya nwụrụ mgbè a mụrụ ya, ya mèrè, naanị ọrụ dị n'aka nna ya ịzụlite ya.
Krikko lụrụ ma mesịa kewaa ya na ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri Nollywood a ma ama bụ OBOT ETUK; ha nwere ụmụ abụọ bụ Obot Ubong na Obot Idara.

Krikko si Naịjirịa kwaga United States n'afọ 1974, ma mesịa gaa Mahadum nke Southwestern Louisiana n'ime School of Arts and Architecture, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1981. Kemgbe afọ 1990, ọ na-ebi na New Haven, Connecticut, ébé ọ nọgidere na-eji nzere ya na-ewu ụlọ
N'afọ 2007 Krikko zụrụ ụlọ nke ụlọ Phillip Fresenius House n'ọbọdọ New Haven màkà $ 5,000. A gbahapụrụ ụlọ ahụ, nke dị na 210 West Street, n'elu "The Hill", kemgbe e mechiri ụlọ ọrụ biya ahụ na 1977
N'oge Krikko zụrụ ya, ụlọ ahụ adịghị mma ma jupụta na agịga ọgwụ na nsị anụmanụ
Ọ na-eme atụmatụ ịgbanwe ụlọ ahụ ka ọ bụrụ "A Pencil Museum In the Hill;" ébé ngosi nka ụmụaka nwéré ụlọ ngosi ọha na eze na oghere studio
Ọbọdọ New Haven anabatala ọrụ ahụ, ka ha na-achọ iwughachi mpaghara gbara ya gburugburu.
N'èzí ọrụ ya dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe, Krikko bụ ónyé na-egwu saxophon jazz.
